abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32865300, pmid32860649, pmid32846051, pmid32841510, pmid32865245, pmid32809969, pmid32845795, pmid32786383, pmid32849972, pmid32860038, pmid32849949
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.09.02
